description: OneAgent automatically monitors host, its processes, services and applications but you can switch off monitoring or disable auto-injection.

autoInjection.description: An auto-injection disabled with [oneagentctl](https://dt-url.net/oneagentctl) takes precedence over this setting and cannot be changed from the Dynatrace web UI.

enabled.description: Turn on monitoring to gain visibility into this host, its processes, services, and applications.
